title: I'm a celebrity font
content:
Does anyone know what the font(s) used on the 'I'm a Celebrity' programme are?  
Thanks a million in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119012429im_/http:/typophile.com/files/im-a-celebrity-get-me-out-of-here-large-logo_3987.jpg)
author: marie_t

comments.content:
Hi Marie,  
welcome to Typophile!

Try [Bordeaux](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119012429/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/bordeaux-roman/) and [Mistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119012429/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=mistral) (w/ fake [small caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119012429/http:/typophile.com/wiki/small%20caps)).  
F
